DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Bupropion Smoking Cessation Postpartum Non-breastfeeding Women
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : A pilot randomize double-blind placebo-controlled trial test feasibility conduct full-scale trial efficacy bupropion SR vs. placebo non-breastfeeding postpartum woman smoke > 1 cigarette last month pregnancy want stop smoking . The study estimate achievable enrollment retention rate ; estimate effect size drug tobacco abstinence ; ass tolerability bupropion postpartum woman ; allow refinement recruitment , retention , intervention , assessment protocol . Research Design : Pilot double-blind placebo-controlled randomized clinical trial . Study Population : 40 postpartum woman age 18 year old smoke > 1 cigarette last month pregnancy , want stop smoking , breastfeed . Subjects recruit postpartum hospitalized delivery . Intervention : Bupropion SR ( match placebo ) 8 week , start immediately post-delivery . The dose 150 mg qd one week 150 mg bid 7 week . All subject receive behavioral counseling deliver face-to-face post-delivery hospitalization telephone 4 time 8 week . Outcome Measures : ( assessed 2 , 4 , 8 , 12 week postpartum ) : 1 . Study eligibility , recruitment , retention rate ( primary outcome ) . 2 . Tobacco abstinence ( 7-day point prevalence nonsmoking self-report confirm saliva cotinine 2 week , 8 week ( end drug treatment ) , 12 week postpartum . 3 . Postpartum weight loss symptom depression anxiety . 4 . Tolerability postpartum bupropion , assessed medication adherence adverse effect .
